mapper.select: select notice_no, admin_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_view, notice_date from notice order by notice_no desc
SELECT notice_no, admin_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_view, notice_date from notice WHERE notice_no=#{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET notice_no=#{noticeNo}, ADMINID=#{adminId}, NOTICETITLE=#{noticeTitle}, NOTICECONTENT=#{noticeContent}, NOTICEVIEW=#{noticeView}, NOTICEDATE=#{noticeDate}
